data.title: New York Post
data.meta_description: Get the latest colin firth news, articles, videos and photos on the New York Post.
data.text:
Renée Zellweger officially back for ‘Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy’ — is Hugh Grant?

Bridget Jones is back to write in her infamous diary once again.

'Mary Poppins' age rating changed in UK over 'discriminatory language'

"While 'Mary Poppins' has historical context, the use of discriminatory language is not condemned ... We therefore classified the film PG for discriminatory language." -- The British Board of Film...

These beloved leading men are actually total jerks: book

Your favorite romance stories have all been a lie.

National Boyfriend Day: What kind of BF are you based on your zodiac sign?

National Boyfriend Day arrives on Oct. 3, allowing us to recognize the ways our partners show up in relationships.

Mansion from BBC's 'Pride and Prejudice' lists for $7.3M in England

An equestrian estate in England where the BBC's hit "Pride and Prejudice" series was filmed can now be yours.

‘The Staircase’: Bizarre twists and theories of Kathleen Peterson’s death

There are several outrageous twists and theories — including an owl did it — in the mysterious death of Peterson, who was found at the bottom of a staircase.

How Stanley Tucci lost his taste — and almost his love of food — to cancer

"Even just the thought of food disgusted me," the actor and epicurean writes of his battle with oral cancer in "Taste: My Life Through Food."

Emmy nominee Josh O'Connor proves he's a movie star in 'Mothering Sunday'

The 2021 Emmy nominee has advanced into a new stage of stardom with "Mothering Sunday." He plays an irresistible, confident romantic lead instead of sniveling, down-in-the-dumps Charles. He’s billed higher...

HBO Chief Casey Bloys Opens Up About 'Mare of Easttown's Success and the Future of HBO and HBO Max

Plus updates on Succession Season 3, the Game of Thrones spin-off, and more.

Stream It Or Skip It: 'Supernova' On Hulu, Where Stanley Tucci & Colin Firth Play A Couple Running Out Of Time

The beloved performers star in this heartbreaking drama about a couple facing the devastation of dementia.

Rupert Everett says Colin Firth used tongue during movie kiss scene

“The weird thing was, I had no idea that Colin was going to tongue me."

Stream It Or Skip It: 'The Secret Garden' on Hulu, a Visually Pumped-Up Version of an Oft-Told Classic Story

This film adaptation of the classic novel is notably the first of the CGI era.

Stream It Or Skip It: '1917' on Showtime, a World War I Saga That's Breathless in its Visual Artistry

An gruelingly intense story told in two (or so) crazy-long shots.

Colin Firth talks Hollywood's umpteenth 'Secret Garden' remake

"I didn't expect the castle to be so creepy. Or that garden to be so sumptuous."
